sitePresentation.title: Site presentation
sitePresentation.text2: Developed it using the free code framework for programming Angular Cli , it used Google Firebase which is a cloud platform where it has allowed me to manage databases in real time and authentication for this site, using this platform to host the application on its server for free. The code for this site is posted at GitHub
sitePresentation.text3: For design: NgZorro , which is a Angular User Interface.

personalSummary.title: Personal summary
personalSummary.text1: First of all I introduce myself, my name is Alejandro Manuel Bolaño Méndez and I am a Computer Engineer, graduated from the Technological University of Havana "Jose Antonio Echevarría" and I am from Cuban.
personalSummary.text2: I am a young man with broad desires for personal and professional improvement. I have specialized in the world of web development and Android lover. Also, I love the world of marketing and sales. I consider myself a young worker, discreet, humble, self-sacrificing and ambitious.
